content: कौस्तुभः [कुस्तुभो जलधिस्तत्र भवः अण्] {@--1@} <ab>N.</ab> of a celebrated gem obtained with 13 other jewels at the churning of the ocean and worn by Viṣṇu on his breast; सकौस्तुभं ह्रेप यतीव कृष्णं <ls>R. 6. 49</ls>; <ls n="R.">10. 10.</ls> {@--2@} A kind of oil. {@--3@} A manner of joining the fingers.
